title: Can we admit that adc items are too cheap.
body:
3400 gold is too cheap for {{item:3031}} an item that gives a bigger power spike than {{item:3089}} which costs 3800. Its quite common to see adcs complete 3 big items at 25 minutes and become impossible to itemize against because they can shred through any tankiness even in the midgame where they are supposed to be weak.
{{item:3031}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3153}} all should cost about 3700-3900 gold.

replies.body: i have no fucking idea how you think 3400 gold is cheap and rabadons doesnt rely on rng to give its damage

No ADC will have "3 big items" at 25 minutes unless he has 20 kills already.

So that tells me something about your skill level if its "quite common" to see that.

i stated in a post a while ago that the cost change to adc items were gonna buff mid games of adcs 

and hence we started seeing hyper carries coming back cuz they can get those items cheaper and hit power curves faster
